name: Personal Financial Coaching
description: Personal Financial Coaching is one-on-one coaching session that can help you to identify your personal financial goals, eliminate debt, create a working budget, deal with collectors.

name: Business Financial Coaching
description: Business Financial Coaching can help you learn to take control of your business finances and also help your employees become better with money and more financially empowered.

name: Stay-On-Track
description: Stay-On-Track is a specialized course which can help you to map out a plan of action, develop new habits and break old ones and set you on the path to build confidence with your finance.
